content: What's the correct way to bypass mathlib cache download at lake update now? It was export MATHLIB_NO_CACHE_ON_UPDATE=1 but seems that now it doesn't work anymore. This breaks TryLean4 Windows bundle build. This is the last build log: https://github.com/acmepjz/TryLean4Bundle1/actions/runs/16084301712/job/45393444657. In "Create Windows bundle" > "create demo project" you can see it still download and unpack cache files.
This makes the bundle 2.2GB after compression, which exceeds maximal size limit of github.
Oh sorry. It seems that the cache download is at lake new now. Let me try again.
OK fixed by adding environment variable before lake new.
Jz Pan has marked this topic as resolved.
